description: This file is a mock class definition for COMLink used in testing, with conditional compilation to handle different build configurations. It uses Google Mock to define mock methods for the ICOMLink interface.

classes.name: COMLinkMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing the ICOMLink interface for testing, with methods for registration, unregistration, remote connection retrieval, and instantiation, conditional on build configuration.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the Register method for ICOMLink, accepting a notification pointer.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the Unregister method for ICOMLink, accepting a notification pointer.

methods.name: RemoteConnection
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of a remote connection by ID.

methods.name: Instantiate
methods.description: Mocks the Instantiate method for creating objects.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(void*, Instantiate, (const WPEFramework::RPC::Object&, const uint32_t, uint32_t&, const string&, const string&), (override))
